description:
模板一丨关于职位

The only reason is that I want a higher position. I’d like to have a job that is more dynamic and challenging. I want to work in a company where I can display my ability, and I hope to have an opportunity to develop my abilities.唯一的原因是我想要谋求更高的职位。我想要做更有活力和具有挑战性的工作。 我想在能展示我能力的公司里工作，并且我希望有机会使我的能力得到发展。

说法二丨关于公司规模

In my first job, I worked in a small company where the division of labor was very clear，but I didn’t have much chance to enrich my experience. After I left there, I found a job in a larger company where I hoped to broaden my horizon, but unfortunately the economic crisis compelled my boss to close his business, so I had to leave my position.我的第一份工作是在一家分工明确的小公司内任职，但是没有足够的机会来丰富 我的经验。离开那儿之后，我在一家稍大一些的公司里找到一份工作，我希望能在那里开阔眼界，但是不幸的是，经济危机使我的老板不得不停止经营，所以我不得不离开。

说法三丨关于发挥空间

I have changed my job so frequently just because I have a higher goal for work. My former jobs made me see no chance for further advancement and I was not able to fully utilize my skills. I want to give full play to my skills in my work and broaden my knowledge by gaining different experiences.我如此频繁地换工作，只是因为我有着更高层次的工作目标。我之前的工作都让 我看不到前景，并且我也不能充分发挥我的能力。我想要在工作中充分地展示自己的 能力，也要通过获得不同的经验来扩展自己的知识。

说法四丨关于薪水

Because I want to find an ideal company that I really want to work for for a long period of time, and then I would settle down and make a long-term contribution. And I hope the company would offer me with a more reasonable salary for I have a family.因为我想找到一家我真的愿意长期为之效劳的理想中的公司，然后我会安定下来， 并做出长久的贡献。我也希望公司能给我提供较为合理的薪水，因为我要养家糊口。
